text:
Moneylion has had some really
exponential growth over the
years, you know,
and part of that means

that our technology vendors
really need to be able
to scale with us.

We've seen a lot of really
great service outcomes since
switching over to Amazon Connect.

But I would say that my
top three are probably our

operational efficiency, our
customer satisfaction outcomes

as well, and a decrease
in our recontact rate,

or an increase in first
contact resolution.
Ultimately, our internal stakeholders love
that they are getting richer,

faster insights from
telephony conversations,

which historically has been
a really difficult channel
to gather really rich insights out of.

Customers will often talk
a lot about the things

that they like, the things that
they don't like when they're
speaking via voice in a way
that they won't via written channels.

And previously that was
completely locked behind whether
or not an agent was willing to type all of
that out in their after call work.
Since rolling out Amazon Connect,

we have seen a really big
uplift in terms of the data

and the insights and the rich
richness of those insights
across our tech stack, which means

that we have lower issues
in terms of quality,
we have reduced QA issues, you know,

we have faster improvements
into our products as well.
Partnership is really important to us
as well as scalability.
So working with AWS is a no-brainer.
